trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterCommandEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.ItemCommand" /> event of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示将用来处理 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.ItemCommand" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater" /> 事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterCommandEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeaterCommandEventHandler> 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 事件和委托](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.ItemCommand> event of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何指定和代码的处理程序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.ItemCommand>事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>。

trans-unit.source: Information about the button is displayed when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 显示有关该按钮的信息时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>控件中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater>单击。
